mapper.sql: id AS "id" , order_code AS "orderCode" , store_code AS "storeCode" , user_code AS "userCode" , charge_mobile_number AS "chargeMobileNumber" , charge_data_size AS "chargeDataSize" , charge_status AS "chargeStatus" , charge_task_code AS "chargeTaskCode" , exec_times AS "execTimes" , max_exec_times AS "maxExecTimes" , last_exec_err_code AS "lastExecErrCode" , last_exec_err_msg AS "lastExecErrMsg" , last_exec_date AS "lastExecDate" , schedule_exec_date AS "scheduleExecDate" , current_exec_computer AS "currentExecComputer" , current_exec_process_id AS "currentExecProcessId" , current_exec_start_date AS "currentExecStartDate" , create_date AS "createDate" , update_date AS "updateDate" , delete_date AS "deleteDate"

sql.set: id = #{id}, order_code = #{orderCode}, store_code = #{storeCode}, user_code = #{userCode}, charge_mobile_number = #{chargeMobileNumber}, charge_data_size = #{chargeDataSize}, charge_status = #{chargeStatus}, charge_task_code = #{chargeTaskCode}, exec_times = #{execTimes}, max_exec_times = #{maxExecTimes}, last_exec_err_code = #{lastExecErrCode}, last_exec_err_msg = #{lastExecErrMsg}, last_exec_date = #{lastExecDate}, schedule_exec_date = #{scheduleExecDate}, current_exec_computer = #{currentExecComputer}, current_exec_process_id = #{currentExecProcessId}, current_exec_start_date = #{currentExecStartDate}, create_date = #{createDate}, update_date = #{updateDate}, delete_date = #{deleteDate},

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_svp_mobile_data_order_detail ( id, order_code, store_code, user_code, charge_mobile_number, charge_data_size, charge_status, charge_task_code, exec_times, max_exec_times, last_exec_err_code, last_exec_err_msg, last_exec_date, schedule_exec_date, current_exec_computer, current_exec_process_id, current_exec_start_date, create_date, update_date, delete_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{orderCode}, #{storeCode}, #{userCode}, #{chargeMobileNumber}, #{chargeDataSize}, #{chargeStatus}, #{chargeTaskCode}, #{execTimes}, #{maxExecTimes}, #{lastExecErrCode}, #{lastExecErrMsg}, #{lastExecDate}, #{scheduleExecDate}, #{currentExecComputer}, #{currentExecProcessId}, #{currentExecStartDate}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{deleteDate} )
